Recommended price: ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬ 64.99
Recommended age (PEGI): 16

Fable III, the latest installment of the critically acclaimed Xbox 360 exclusive franchise, fans both new and always will embark on an epic adventure, where the race for the crown is only the beginning of a spectacular journey. It has been five decades since the events of Fable II and Albion has matured to an industrial revolution, but the fate of the kingdom is in danger. We ask that you join your town and fight alongside them, to ascend to power and to experience what it means to defend your throne. Along your journey, the decisions you make will change the world around you, for the general good or for your own personal gain. Who do you go to convert? What a rebel without a cause, the tyrant against whom you rebelled, or at best ruler that ever lived? Features: Become a hero and forge your own destiny, "Fable III" takes you to the center of a remarkable story filled with action, drama and humor that runs from your rebellion as a revolutionary to your ascent to the throne. Decisions and consequences: Kind or evil, loved or hated, or just cruel ... Each adventure is unique! Your decisions have a profound impact, affecting the fate of the entire realm of Albion. Interact with the world of Albion has never been easier: The renewed expression system allows your hero to achieve a degree of interaction with the world of Albion as never before seen in a videogame. A constantly changing world: Your hero, your faithful canine companion, and even your weapons evolve according to your morality and style of fighting, resulting in unique combinations for each player. The action never stops: The evolved combat system allows you to combine different attacks (melee, guns or spells) offering endless fighting styles. Revolutionaries of the world unite!: Share your world of Albion and live your adventure with a friend over Xbox Live thanks to the dynamic cooperative mode that lets you join a game at any time.
